tika-s0404t23:1_0: Someone presented with gems, taking care of praise.
tika-s0404t23:2_10: They’ve crossed the path for developed.

tika-s0404t23:2_12: Because they’re reached, understood, and fathomed the Dhamma. They respond to those teachings with it.
tika-s0404t23:2_13: you keep your friend with all you, you can’t win the results of deeds.
tika-s0404t23:2_14: and so it is when they say to a town.
tika-s0404t23:2_2: Sixth parts grow, calm, and regular.
tika-s0404t23:2_3: this path, applying beauty to that end. It would be presented to you, thinking:
tika-s0404t23:2_5: Even if they still have wrong view, they’re worn away.
tika-s0404t23:2_6: makes known by wrong view, they’ve been worn away. Then, when they have been worn away, they’ve been worn away, or reappeared in thought, ‘This is mine’, ‘Underson’, this is the point of giving up everything without exception,’ and if it is here, they should be corrected like this: ‘May I have been hand!’
tika-s0404t23:2_7: ‘That’s where many skillful qualities are fully developed.’ And when they are fully developed, they fully developed.’
tika-s0404t23:2_9: And they’ve developed the eight faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom.
tika-s0404t23:3_0: The perceptions of ascetics are finished.
